Trails.Name: Lost in the Woods (Lower) Uphill Route
Lost in the Woods (Upper) Uphill Route

_inspectorSnowReport.Report: Tuesday, December 23, 2025 6:00 AM The big storm is rolling in over the mountain this morning, bringing cloudy skies and moderate winds. 12 lifts are expected, conditions permitting. Snowfall is forecast to kick off late this evening and continue for several days, setting the stage for a true winter wonderland. Please prepare your vehicle for winter travel. Early season obstacles exist, so please ski and ride with caution. Canyon Lodge is open for access only. Beginners should plan to start and end your day at Main Lodge for the best experience.
_inspectorSnowReport.SafetyReport: Give others space on the slopes
